mapper.select: select a.pan_board_comment_no as no, a.pan_board_no as boardNo, a.user_no as userNo, a.pan_board_comment_content as commentContent, a.pan_board_comment_like_cnt as likeCnt, a.pan_board_comment_created_date as createdDate, b.user_nickname as nickname from latte_pan_board_comments a, latte_users b where a.user_no = b.user_no and a.pan_board_no = #{value}
mapper.insert:
select latte_pan_board_comment_no_seq.nextval from dual
insert into latte_pan_board_comments (pan_board_comment_no, pan_board_no, user_no, pan_board_comment_content) values (#{no}, #{boardNo}, #{userNo}, #{content})
